thread.title: Sensi Read and SR Sensi Frank
thread.title_full: Greatmats reviewed by Sensi Read and SR Sensi Frank

author: Sensi Read and SR Sensi Frank
title: Sensi Read and SR Sensi Frank
text: Bought one, great price will be purchasing more for kids at my church. Small judo and karate class. I am almost 70 cannot compete any more, old and beat up, ha ha. Injoy teaching Great kids learning discipline, respect and honor. Old school.
